name: Road To Dakar
description:
Road to Dakar is an endless runner where you drive a pink SUV while listening to HOME tunes.

There is no proper goal. 

This is a prototype I've made to learn more about Unity 3d. Comment and feedback would be more than appreciated, as it will give me an idea on whether or not it'll be worth revisiting when I hone my skills some more C:

Controls:

WASD to move.
X to brake.

Shift to boost.

R to flip the car.

Space to switch to side view

Credit:
HOME (Yes, I asked). 

Songs from "Before the Night"

- Sun

- Nosebleed

- Pyxis

- Above All

- Synchronize

Why "Road to Dakar"?
I asked my friends to choose a title for me, and they mostly mentioned Kebab because I have poor choices in brethren. 

I went with "Road to [something]" and just thought "Why not Dakar?" It's my home town and I live really far away from it, so imagining going back home via a car would take an impossible amount of time.

The game is FREE. Only tip if you feel like it. click on "No thanks, take me to download" and enjoy.
